grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 相矛盾【アイムジュン】mutually contradictory
形容矛盾【ケイヨウムジュン】contradictio in adjecto, contradiction between an adjective and the noun it modifies (wooden iron, hot ice, etc.)
kun reading compounds: 楯突く【たてつく】to defy, to disobey, to rebel against, to oppose, to resist
人間の盾【にんげんのたて】human shield
